name: part_000
file: tmp_【＃不知火フレア生誕祭 】3D Singing Live！誕生日だし一緒に盛り上がろう！ 【ホロライブ⧸不知火フレア】 [_rJhAn6ZPuU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening sequence with the title and birthday logo of Shiranui Flare.
Performance of the song 'Welcome!2000' by Shiranui Flare.

subtitles.original:
Welcome!2000
作詞：コゲどんぼ / 作曲：坂本裕介
subtitles.english:
Welcome!2000
Lyrics: Koge-Donbo / Composition: Yusuke Sakamoto

subtitles.original: Welcome to Welcome to Welcome to my house
subtitles.english: Welcome to, welcome to, welcome to my house

subtitles.original: Welcome to Welcome to Welcome to my house
subtitles.english: Welcome to, welcome to, welcome to my house

subtitles.original: 生まれたての 朝陽が ササン
subtitles.english: The freshly born morning sun is shining brightly

subtitles.original: 水と森が 光って キラキラ
subtitles.english: The water and forest are sparkling and glittering

subtitles.original: 今日もお掃除 ピカピカ
subtitles.english: Cleaning today too, making it shiny

subtitles.original: 猫の手も借りたい くらいだにょ
subtitles.english: I'm so busy I'd even take a cat's help, nya

subtitles.original: つまらないこと 気にしないにょ
subtitles.english: Don't worry about boring things, nya

subtitles.original: ミスっちゃっても 転んじゃっても 前向きに ゴーゴー
subtitles.english: Even if I make a mistake or fall down, go go positively

subtitles.original: 今日もあたしは おおいそがし
subtitles.english: I'm very busy today too

subtitles.original: 疲れちゃっても 戦闘モードにょ
subtitles.english: Even if I get tired, I'm in battle mode, nya

subtitles.original: Welcome to Welcome to Welcome to my house
subtitles.english: Welcome to, welcome to, welcome to my house

subtitles.original: 頑張るにょ ちょっとだけ どじなあたしでも
subtitles.english: I'll do my best, even if I'm a bit of a klutz

subtitles.original: Welcome to Welcome to Welcome to my house
subtitles.english: Welcome to, welcome to, welcome to my house

subtitles.original: 今日も君が 来てくれるの
subtitles.english: You're coming to see me again today

subtitles.original: 待ってるにょ
subtitles.english: I'm waiting for you, nya

subtitles.original: 待ってるにょ
subtitles.english: I'm waiting for you, nya

subtitles.original: 沈んでゆく 夕陽は ユラユラ
subtitles.english: The setting sun is swaying

subtitles.original: 迷子の子猫は ふわふわ
subtitles.english: The lost kitten is fluffy

subtitles.original: 今日も足元 フラフラ
subtitles.english: Wobbly feet again today

subtitles.original: お日様も ご苦労様だにょ
subtitles.english: Good job to the sun too, nya

subtitles.original: 過ぎちゃったこと 振り返らないにょ
subtitles.english: Don't look back at what's already passed, nya

subtitles.original: 失敗しちゃっても 恥ずかしくっても 後悔は ノノ
subtitles.english: Even if I fail or feel embarrassed, no regrets, no-no

subtitles.original: いつもあたしは おおいそがし
subtitles.english: I'm always very busy

subtitles.original: 落ち込まないで 戦闘モードにょ
subtitles.english: Don't get depressed, I'm in battle mode, nya
